values.desc: Years of experiences are key—that’s why when it comes to client selection, we’re choosy. We want to give our experiences and knowledge to guidance you deserve.

section_about.description:
ABOUT US.

After 22 years in underground Utility Locating industry, we decided to provide quality services.
Now, we share our passion by helping others. Our ramp up process is designed to prevent underground pipe and cable damages.


So, why choose us?

section_footer.desc: We’ve built a reputation for providing high-quality cable detection services to our corporate partners at competitive rates.

section_gallery.short_desc: Our Team has worked on sites all around from small scaled jobs for independent plumbers to large scale government infrastructure projects, no job is too big or too small.

section_service.desc:
WHY IS CABLE DETECTION

NECESSARY?

Information is the most important ingredient in any undertaking. It permits planning an afternoon’s work or planning a multimillion-dollar enterprise. The difficulty of obtaining information about buried utility lines is that nothing is visible. Drawings, plans, or information should always be obtained but they may be faulty or incomplete. A suitable technique has to be used to obtain the information from the underground.

We use Electromagnetic location, a method of locating buried pipes, cables, and sewers and it has become almost universal. Its main shortcoming is that it will not locate non-metallic lines such as plastic pipes. However, utilities taking a small amount of trouble to lay tracer wires with plastic pipes are not affected by this shortcoming.
section_service.short_desc: Years of experience in the industry along with partnerships with many major corporations.
